_comment: Configuration for feature synthesis with multiprocessing enabled

_description.max_generations: Maximum number of generations to evolve (default: 50)
_description.elitism: Whether to use elitism (keep best individual) (default: true)
_description.use_multi_feature: Whether to evolve multiple features sequentially (default: false)
_description.n_features_to_create: Number of features to create when use_multi_feature is true (default: 1)
_description.cv: Number of cross-validation folds for fitness evaluation (default: 3)
_description.use_multiprocessing: Enable multiprocessing for fitness calculations (default: false)
_description.n_jobs: Number of processes to use for multiprocessing (-1 uses all cores, default: 1)
